host.label: Hostname
host.help: Hostname or IP address of the Qolsys IQ panel

port.label: Port Number
port.help: Port number of the Qolsys IQ panel (usually 12345)

secureToken.label: Secure Token
secureToken.help: C4 Secure Token from the Qolsys IQ panel admin

userPinCode.label: User Pin Code
userPinCode.help: Pin code to use when arming/disarming

enableArming.label: Enable arming panel
enableArming.help: Allow adapter to send arming requests to the panel

enableDisarming.label: Enable disarming panel
enableDisarming.help: Allow adapter to send disarming requests to the panel

enableAlarms.label: Enable triggering alarms
enableAlarms.help: Allow the adapter to trigger police/fire/aux alarms
